channel.title: SCAR Chanter - Scriptable singer
channel.description:
this is like an autotyper, except you can make your own scripts [lyrics] for it
each new line is seprated by a carrage return, so its very easy to copy/paste lyrics from a website into a file, you can also assign how fast you want it to be played, and any prefixes you want before each line, like 'red:'
theres a whole little tutorial and example lyric files to try it out
sorry if my taste in music is differant from yours, but you can easily make your own scripts
it can be used in instant messangers, IRC or runescape,
heres a screenshot of me, 'entertaining', those karamja fishers... damn unappreciative people... :rolleyes: [URL=http://img253.imageshack.us/img253/9125/dylantb5.png][IMG]http://img253.imageshack.us/img253/9125/dylantb5.th.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: SCAR Chanter - Scriptable singer
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

thats exactly what it is, except its only the base engine, and you write your own plugins which contain the words, you can also write the wait between each line and some other things

item.title: SCAR Chanter - Scriptable singer
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

sorry for jumping like that Ron, i just though you missed the point of the scirpt a little

heres a post where i wrote how i feel about rep, the thread was bumped up right after i wrote it, so i think very few people read it http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/showpost.php?p=54178&postcount=21

i was talking to some people, and no-one else likes Bob dylan. anyone around here like him?

item.title: SCAR Chanter - Scriptable singer
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Wooah didn’t know you cared so much about rep. Well, it was just a suggestion. And you can always have the also in the memo box, right?

Any way, I was just trying to help. Sorry. I’ll try to avoid your topics in the future, and for the rep part, anyone that thinks this is a good script, rep yakman.

Hope that clears things up.

Read full topic

item.title: SCAR Chanter - Scriptable singer
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

they are lyrics so that you can use them over and over again,
this isnt an autotyper, its a scriptable engine
its meant to be used so people can send their lyrics around, since you can also put waits and specify the typing speed and stuff

the lyric files can have pauses you specify between each lyrics
example.

the internationale unites the human race
<1000>
#the above line makes the script pause for 1000 millisec
no more deluded by reaction

dont take this the wrong way, but that is a bad idea, its totally missed the point of my script

and with that little speech, iv totally ruined any chance of getting repped But it was so worth it!! power to the people salute

Read full topic

item.title: SCAR Chanter - Scriptable singer
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Nice, but instead of making the script get the Lyrics txt file, just make a form and put up a memo box. Then have the script save each line of the memo box to an array, free the form, and then send each array value. Much easier to paste the lyrics right in a scar form than making a text file, putting the lyrics in, saving it, getting the location of the file, and finally putting it in scar.

Read full topic
